game.name: Blood Strike
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 대규모 멀티플레이어, 전략, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 앱 내 구매, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: Gather your friends and dive into the action-packed Battle Royale, Squad Fight, or Hot Zone like there's no tomorrow! Blood Strike offers a wide range of playable Strikers, each with a unique active and passive ability letting you deploy drones, shield walls and everything in between.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gather your friends and dive into the action-packed Battle Royale, Squad Fight, or Hot Zone like there's no tomorrow! Blood Strike offers a wide range of playable Strikers, each with a unique active and passive ability letting you deploy drones, shield walls and everything in between.

reviewHighlights.text: 시발 게임 존나팅기고 실행하면 바로 팅기고 무슨 사람같고 장난하나 그럴꺼면 섭종하든가 시발 .......................
ITS SUCH GOOD VERY BAD GAME
